channel.title: Minecraft Roleplay Server - Fall of an Empire â€“ Amaria
channel.description: Recent content in Amaria on Minecraft Roleplay Server - Fall of an Empire

item.title: Docs: Arnar
item.description:
The quiet city of the barbarians lives in the frigid lands of the east, plagued mainly by the weather rather than any specific creatures the Barbarians have found a peaceful life here

Only the gobel to the north and sirens to the east could pose a threat, but they never venture this far into the tundra

item.title: Docs: Eindel
item.description: The Aerindal City of the West, plagued by the Lizardmen of the South this city is saved only by its high clifftop position deep within the jungle

item.title: Docs: Morheim
item.description: The Keladun city of the north, due to its strength it was able to support the caerthian renegade outpost Haven during the Caerthian Invasion

item.title: Docs: Olvasound
item.description: This legendary druid city lays just north of Morheim and finds its coastal position well guarded for the many traders that come over see to and from the city

item.title: Docs: Shasun
item.description: An Anushi trader settlement to the east of Eindel

item.title: Docs: Undergate
item.description: The Dark Elf city of Undergate finds itself nestled as the only gateway to the Under in Amaria. The Dark Elves take advantage of this ensuring all must go through them to get to the vast resources laying under Solinia
